titleStmt.title: A letter to the loyal apprentices in and about London and Westminster, for their making of a noble, extraordinary, rejoycing prossession, on Monday the eleventh of April, 1698 : being His Majesties coronation day, in congratulation of His Majestys safe return home; : and for the honourable, firm, and lasting peace. / written by Captain Anthony Stampe.
titleStmt.author: Stampe, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Whitlock, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
